attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Apache Geronimo implementation of the JSR-330 Dependency Injection Spec API

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Apache Geronimo implementation of the JSR-365 Context and Dependency Injection 2.0 Specification

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: This bundle contains an extender that facilitates the useof Geronimo spec providers (components typically plugged in to theJRE through META-INF/services resources). The service created by thisextender will maintain a registry of factory class implementations thatcan be used by the spec bundles to locate factory classes that reside inother bundles.

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: This bundle is not used as a standalone unit, but contains classes thatshould be copied into another bundle as a private package.

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Apache Geronimo implementation of the JSR-353

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Apache Geronimo implementation of the JSR-374

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Apache Geronimo implementation of the JSR-374
